title: The costs of Reliance’s wildlife ambitions
selftext: Will the real prime minister pleaae stand up, please stand up!
comments: If he wants to spend so much then let him. I don't understand the jibe at him...

It's not a jibe.

Animals are being "collected" through illegal or shady means. It's being made into a private reserve at the cost of stealing from public reserves.
